name: Solix, Soul Corrupter
description:
Soul Corrupter destroys humanity by driving people to madness.

First, it destroys an individual's will to live by erasing sense of purpose. Then the Soul Corrupter indoctrinates the followers with AntiLife ideologies.
His programming culminates with mass suicide events, killing thousands without laying a finger on them.

Solix is an AntiMetro; Meta creatures bred by Khuzard of the future. They are created to decimate modern human civilizations and let earth begin anew.
